title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V1\UpdateCustomClassRequest
name: UpdateCustomClassRequest
description:
Message sent by the client for the UpdateCustomClass method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v1.UpdateCustomClassRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.custom_class
params.description: Required. The custom class to update. The custom class's name field is used to identify the custom class to be updated. Format: projects/{project}/locations/{location}/customClasses/{custom_class} Speech-to-Text supports three locations: global, us (US North America), and eu (Europe). If you are calling the speech.googleapis.com endpoint, use the global location. To specify a region, use a regional endpoint with matching us or eu location value.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: The list of fields to be updated.
